## Type of Change

- [ ] `feat` - New feature
- [ ] `fix` - Bug fix
- [ ] `docs` - Documentation
- [ ] `refactor` - Code refactoring
- [ ] `test` - Tests
- [ ] `chore` - Maintenance

## Checklist

- [ ] Branch follows naming convention (`feat/`, `fix/`, `docs/`, `refactor/`, `test/`)
- [ ] Commits follow conventional commits format
- [ ] Tests pass (if applicable)
- [ ] Lint/syntax checks pass
- [ ] Documentation updated (if applicable)
- [ ] No hardcoded secrets or credentials
- [ ] State files update correctly (if applicable)
